# Machine Learning Fundamentals

Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that focuses on algorithms. For more information, see our [neural networks guide](https://kb.example.com/neural-networks) and [data preprocessing tutorial](https://kb.example.com/data-preprocessing). External resources include [TensorFlow documentation](https://tensorflow.org/docs) and [scikit-learn user guide](https://scikit-learn.org/stable/user_guide.html).
